name: Duolingo Dark 2 (Customizable)
description: Turn off the light! This is a dark theme for Duolingo.com. This is a customizable version of Duolingo Dark 2. You can use the text boxes below to customize the background and text color.
additional_info:
Using Style Settings Some versions of Stylish can now update userstyles that have style settings. If the stylish you have doesn't support updating style settings, you will need to uninstall the original style from Stylish and reinstall. If you do not mind the default color setting and would prefer the ability to update conveniently, then use Regular Duolingo Dark 2. Change Log 15 January 2016
  • Fixed strengthen sidebar in skill tree page
  • Fix separator line in lingot store
26 September 2014
  • Style for word list page and flashcard
  • Style front page
  • Style for course switcher
  • Improved coverage for immersion
  • Many other fixes
19 June 2014
  • style immersion header
  • style discussion tag
  • style review page
  • other minor stuffs
06 March 2014
  • Fix comment background
  • Fix new bonus skills row
23 February 2014
  • Duolingo Dark 2 Customizable is released
  • Add styling to lesson page report, immersion for Duolingo Dark 2
  • Fix to rounded corner in sidebars
  • Other minor fixes
19 February 2014
  • Style upload article page
  • Fixes some texts that become invisible/hard to see
  • Various minor fixes
15 February 2014
  • Duolingo Dark has been totally rewritten from the ground up to match the new Duolingo look and feel.
15 September 2013
  • Updates for Duolingo Store
  • Updates for the newly redesigned lesson pages
5 August 2013
  • Updated for the new redesigned immersion page
  • Added style for the popup window that show up when finishing an immersion translation
27 July 2013
  • Added style settings for text colors.
  • Textboxes can now be customized.
  • Fixed the color for translated and untranslated sentences (thanks to coloraday).
20 July 2013
  • Rewritten a large part of the code so they can be much more easily modified
  • The customizable version now supports customizing background and text color with style settings. Note that support for the ability to customize text color is still incomplete, many text still would not change color.
  • Various minor fixes
19 July 2013
  • Initial release
